description: Girls, Want Lovely Lashes?It's a shame for you not to have curly, dramatic lashes when this little tool does it so easily!Features✓ No pinch no pain curling✓ Non slip handle✓ Ergonomic design, to get every lash✓ The Eye & Mighty eyelash curler lifts and curls like no other eyelash tool. You will know that you have found "the one"✓ The spring loaded handle means you get a lot more lift with less pressure, say goodbye to straight lashes and hello to sexy curvy eyelashes!How To Use The Curler✓ With eyes wide open, position the lash curler at the base of your lashes✓ Gently squeeze and hold for 10 seconds✓ For added drama add 1 coat of mascara for a pretty daytime look✓ 2 coats for a dramatic lookVoila, curly, dramatic lashes!Special Bonus For All Our Valued CustomersDetails in the box or go to www.bellaandbear.com/info/CouponGuaranteeIf you don't completely fall in love with Eye & Mighty thenPlease Contact Us For A Full Refund!Hit the ADD TO CART Button for lovely curly eyelashes today.Copyright 2014 KP Marketing. All Rights Reserved.
title: Eyelash Curler: Eye & Mighty By Bella and Bear - BEST Eyelash Curler for Longer More Dramatic Eyelashes - Special Bonus - 100% LIFETIME MONEY BACK GUARANTEE
